data.comment: The big names in today's match at De Kuip have now been confirmed.
In the minute 29, Almelo's Mats Knoester has been booked in Rotterdam.
Lucas Schoofs (Almelo) has received a yellow card from Martin Van den Kerkhof.
The first-half is over at De Kuip.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Sinan Bakis is booked for the away team.
The home team have replaced Bart Nieuwkoop with Eric Botteghin. This is the first substitution made today by Dick Advocaat.
In the minute 63, Steven Berghuis is replacing Luciano Narsingh for Feyenoord at De Kuip.
Sinan Bakis (Almelo) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Dick Advocaat is making the team's third substitution at De Kuip with Marouan Azarkan replacing Uros Spajic.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Luca de la Torre with Teun Bijleveld.
Adrian Szoke is replacing Rai Vloet for the away team.
Naoufal Bannis is on a sub for Tyrell Malacia for Feyenoord.
At De Kuip, Tim Breukers has been yellow-carded for the away team.
